protocol.name: P-GSE18417-1
text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.name: P-GSE18417-3
protocol.text: For 35 d before use, wild type and transgenic plants grow in controlled environment chambers with 75% humidity and a 14-h-day (200 μE m−2 s−1 at 24°C) and 10-h-night (20°C) cycle.

protocol.name: P-GSE18417-4
protocol.text: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE18417-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE18417-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 15 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45 ℃ on GeneChip Arabidopsis Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE18417-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Gene array Scanner3000 7G.

protocol.name: P-GSE18417-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with GeneChip® Operating Software using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method.
